Package com.intellij.psi

Interface PsiAnnotationOwner

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GrArrayTypeElement, GrBuiltInTypeElement, GrClassTypeElement, GrCodeReferenceElement, GrDisjunctionTypeElement, GrModifierList, GrTypeAnnotationOwner, GrTypeElement, GrTypeParameter, GrWildcardTypeArgument, PsiModifierList, PsiTypeElement, PsiTypeParameter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bottom, ClsModifierListImpl, ClsTypeElementImpl, ClsTypeParameterImpl, GrArrayTypeElementImpl, GrBuiltInTypeElementImpl, GrClassReferenceType, GrClassTypeElementImpl, GrClosureType, GrCodeReferenceElementImpl, GrDisjunctionTypeElementImpl, GrImmediateTupleType, GrLightClassReferenceElement, GrLightModifierList, GrLightTypeElement, GrLiteralClassType, GrMapType, GrMapTypeFromNamedArgs, GrMapTypeImpl, GrModifierListImpl, GrPsiTypeStub, GrRangeType, GrSyntheticTypeElement, GrTraitType, GrTupleType, GrTypeParameterImpl, GrWildcardTypeArgumentImpl, InferenceVariable, LazyFqnClassType, LightModifierList, LightTypeElement, LightTypeParameter, LightTypeParameterBuilder, PsiArrayType, PsiCapturedWildcardType, PsiClassReferenceType, PsiClassType, PsiClassType.Stub, PsiCompositeModifierList, PsiDiamondType, PsiDiamondTypeElementImpl, PsiDiamondTypeImpl, PsiDisjunctionType, PsiEllipsisType, PsiImmediateClassType, PsiIntersectionType, PsiLambdaExpressionType, PsiLambdaParameterType, PsiMethodReferenceType, PsiModifierListImpl, PsiPrimitiveType, PsiType, PsiType.Stub, PsiTypeElementImpl, PsiTypeParameterImpl, PsiTypeVariable, PsiWildcardType

    public interface PsiAnnotationOwner

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PsiAnnotation addAnnotation(java.lang.String qualifiedName)
      Adds a new annotation to this owner.
      PsiAnnotation findAnnotation(java.lang.String qualifiedName)
      Searches the owner for an annotation with the specified fully qualified name and returns one if it is found.
      PsiAnnotation [] getAnnotations()
      Returns the list of annotations syntactically contained in the element.
      PsiAnnotation [] getApplicableAnnotations() 
      default boolean hasAnnotation(java.lang.String qualifiedName)
      Searches the owner for an annotation with the specified fully qualified name and returns true if it is found.

    • Method Detail

      • getAnnotations

        PsiAnnotation [] getAnnotations()
        Returns the list of annotations syntactically contained in the element.
        Returns:
        the list of annotations.

      • getApplicableAnnotations

        PsiAnnotation [] getApplicableAnnotations()
        Returns:
        the list of annotations which are applicable to this owner (e.g. type annotations on method belong to its type element, not the method).

      • findAnnotation

        PsiAnnotation findAnnotation(java.lang.String qualifiedName)
        Searches the owner for an annotation with the specified fully qualified name and returns one if it is found.
        Parameters:
        qualifiedName - the fully qualified name of the annotation to find.
        Returns:
        the annotation instance, or null if no such annotation is found.

      • hasAnnotation

        default boolean hasAnnotation(java.lang.String qualifiedName)
        Searches the owner for an annotation with the specified fully qualified name and returns true if it is found.

        This method is preferable over findAnnotation(java.lang.String) since implementations are free not to instantiate the PsiAnnotation.

        Parameters:
        qualifiedName - the fully qualified name of the annotation to find
        Returns:
        true is such annotation is found, otherwise false

      • addAnnotation

        PsiAnnotation addAnnotation(java.lang.String qualifiedName)
        Adds a new annotation to this owner. The annotation class name will be shortened. No attributes will be defined.
        Parameters:
        qualifiedName - qualifiedName
        Returns:
        newly added annotation
